comment._content: Vera Agnes Huntington Cravath (1895-1985). Her 1917 wedding picture: www.oldlongisland.com/2011/08/when-vera-cravath-wed.html Her NY Times obit: www.nytimes.com/1985/07/30/arts/vera-cravath-gibbs-89-die... Her father Paul Drennan Cravath (1861-1940); his wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Drennan_Cravath Lt. James Larkin was her first husband--they wed in 1917.
